name: Wish-Ender
flavor_text: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

frame.name: Queen's Wrath
frame.description: While aiming down sights with a fully-drawn bow, enemies behind walls are highlighted.

perks.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: High Tension String

perks.description:
Specialized to fight Taken targets.
  •  Increases accuracy
perks.name: Anti-Taken Fletching

perks.description: Piercing arrowhead that damages the target on entry and exit. One shot can overpenetrate multiple targets.
perks.name: Broadhead
